# attachment

**Type Property**

The attachment for the text.

## Declaration

```swift
static let attachment: NSAttributedString.Key
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSTextAttachment] object. The default value of this property is `nil`, indicating no attachment.

## Getting attachment attribute keys

- **adaptiveImageGlyph**: The adaptive image glyph for the text.

items.description: The adaptive image glyph for the text.
